title: Not earning chests after getting S-, S or S+?
body: As title says. I got about 2 S's on zed and I only just bought him and I have 4 chests available. So it's not monthly limit and I haven't earned a chest on Zed yet so... why not..

replies.body: Have you recently been banned or chat restricted? Being banned or chat restricted will prevent you from earning chests until you show signs that you are reforming. More info on that [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463).
Yeah, Tele was right because I just logged into league and had notification I can earn rewards "again". Anyway.. thanks for replies.

No. I got a chest with being chat restricted (bug?). It may be because you have either: earned a chest already with that champion
earned too many chests and have to wait a couple of days for your chests to reload
or yeah, it might possibly chat restricted, IDK.
Yeah I got chat restricted, for the dumbest reason but I guess that's the problem. Thanks..
S- on vayne just then... no chest.
